attributes.action: ignore the EU ruling that British Gibraltar Territorial Waters are part of the Estrecho Oriental Marine Conservation Area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to defend our sovereign claim over Gibraltar and its waters using every power at this nation's disposal, including, if it is deemed necessary, military action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
